price: Zinaya asla yaklaşmayın! Çünkü o, çirkin bir iştir, kötü bir yoldur.
arabic: وَلَا تَقۡرَبُواْ ٱلزِّنَىٰٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَٰحِشَةٗ وَسَآءَ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: walā taqrabū al-zinā innahu kāna fāḥishatan wasāa sabīlan
